{% endraw %}

Installation 

pip install CSF

or using github

git clone https://github.com/ComputerVisionLaboratory/CSF
cd CSF
pip install .

Usage 

import cv2 as cv
import circle_finder


img = cv.imread('/path/to/image.jpg')
csf = circle_finder.CircularSeparabilityFilter()

circles = csf.find_circles(img, num_circles=1)
print(circles)
> >>[[50, 50]]
